entities.name: FacialRecognitionEvent
entities.description: Audit trail entity for all facial recognition activities including authentication attempts, registrations, and bypasses

properties.name: EventDateTime
properties.description: Timestamp when the facial recognition event occurred

properties.name: Event
properties.description: Descriptive text of the facial recognition event

properties.name: Person
properties.description: Reference to the person involved in the facial recognition event

properties.name: Status
properties.description: Status of the facial recognition attempt (Successful, Failed, Bypassed)

properties.name: StoredFile
properties.description: Reference to the facial image file used in the recognition attempt

properties.name: BypassedSession
properties.description: Type of session bypass when biometric authentication is manually overridden (Start, End)

referenceLists.name: FacialRecognitionEventStatus
referenceLists.description: Status outcomes for facial recognition attempts

referenceLists.name: BypassedFacialRecognitionSession
referenceLists.description: Session types for biometric bypass scenarios

referenceLists.name: FileCategory
referenceLists.description: Categories for facial recognition related files
